import React, { Component } from 'react' import Login from '../Login' import Home from '../Home' import LanguageSelector from '../LanguageSelector' import i18n from '../../i18n' import './index.sass' class App extends Component { state = {selectedLanguage: 'en'} handleLanguageSelected = event => { this.setState({ selectedLanguage: event.target.value }) } render() { const { handleLogOut, handleLanguageSelected, state:{selectedLanguage}}= this return
